content: I'm looking to upgrade our current production 3.3 server to the latest 5.2. I have been reviewing the release notes and it seems the big things to watch out for are some settings reorg in 4x and the addition of Smokescreen. Does anyone have any hands on experience or recommendations in an up grade path? Can I go directly from my 3.3 to 5.2 or should I do some intermediate jumps? Currently the OS is Ubuntu 18.04 LTS if that has any effect.

5.x does not support 18.04, so you will need to do this in a few steps:

  1. Upgrade to the latest 3.x release, 3.4
  2. Upgrade to 20.04
  3. Upgrade to the latest 5.x release
Ah perfect that's exacly what I was looking for
To help make this discoverable for the next person, can you tell us where you looked for that information, so we can make it more easily findable?

I did find this page: https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/upgrade-or-modify.html#upgrading-to-a-release
which directed me to look at the upgrade notes for each version since 3.3

I think you need a better note in the upgrade notes of the 5X branch indicating that if you were upgrading from a earlier version or are running Ubuntu 18 you need to first upgrade to the latest 3X, then follow ubuntu 18 to 20 upgrade steps (with link) and then upgrade to 5X
That would have made it more clear for me for sure

I see the note existed in the main upgrade page if you scroll down to the section that shows the 18 to 20 upgrade but I never got that far as the start of the page directs me to look at the upgrade notes page..
Yup, that makes sense. And I think we had some previous thoughts on making a better-indexed separate upgrading notes document.
np thanks for the help in determining the correct upgrade path
Do we want to just do the quick tactical change of extending the existing "Upgrade notes" section at the bottom of the changelog to reference the OS upgrades?
I could imagine even just a sentence linking to the OS upgrade instructions from there being helpful, and then we can always polish more when we find the time to reorganize upgrade notes as a whole?
Thanks for all the help I was able to upgrade the os and zulip to the latest version!
